options.name: Reaction : Brace
options.description: If you are hit with a Melee Attack, you can temporarily increase your Physical Mitigation by your Smithing Skill until the start of your next turn. Also add your Smithing Skill to any Checks that involve Displacing you or knocking you Prone.

options.name: Improved Weapons
options.description: Weapons you Craft gain a +1 Damage Bonus

options.name: Improved Armor
options.description: Chest Armor you Craft gains +1 Physical Mitigation

options.name: Metalworker
options.description: Gain +1 Smithing, +1 Engineering and add an extra Infusion on Chest Armor and Weapons you Craft

options.name: Craft : Smelt
options.description: You can destroy a Weapon or Armor that has a Smithing Recipe in a Forge yielding the Metal Ingots listed in the base Ingredients.

options.name: Efficient Metallurgy
options.description: When you fail to Craft an Object with Smithing, you do not lose any of the Ingots associated with the Recipe.

options.name: Advanced Smithing
options.description: Gain +1 Smithing and access to Smithing Augmentations

options.name: Craft : Precision Forging
options.description: You add an additional 1d4 Bonus to a Smithing Check but the Object can no longer benefit from Overcrafting. This can be used multiple times per Object.

options.name: Craft : Limit Testing
options.description: Once per Object, you can use a Superior Infusion, doubling the required materials and bonuses for either a Reinforced or Insulating Infusion but not increasing the maximum Required Check to successfully complete it.

options.name: Perfectly Balanced
options.description: Melee Weapons you Craft gain a +1 Attack Bonus and Chest Armor gains +1 Elemental Mitigation.

options.name: Free Action : Sunder
options.description: When you hit a Creature with a Melee Weapon they become vulnerable. The next time the Targeted Creature takes Physical Damage, make a Smithing Check and apply that Damage to the total.

options.name: Forged in Fire
options.description: Gain +1 Athletics, +1 Resilience and +4 Fire Mitigation

options.name: Master Smith
options.description: Gain +2 Smithing. Gloves and Boots Crafted by you gain +1 Elemental and +1 Physical Mitigation. Helmets Crafted by you grant Immunity to the Dazed Condition.
